scripts.build: npm install ; tsc -p ./src/server/tsconfig.api.json ; docker build --tag node-docker -f Prod.Dockerfile ./
scripts.dev: npm install ; tsc -p ./src/server/tsconfig.api.json; docker build --tag dev-node-docker -f Dev.Dockerfile ./ ; docker-compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up -d ; concurrently -k "tsc -p ./src/server/tsconfig.api.json -w"
